00043 #ifndef __OPENCV_GPU_DYNAMIC_SMEM_HPP__
00044 #define __OPENCV_GPU_DYNAMIC_SMEM_HPP__
00045 
00046 namespace cv { namespace gpu { namespace device
00047 {
00048     template<class T> struct DynamicSharedMem
00049     {
00050         __device__ __forceinline__ operator T*()
00051         {
00052             extern __shared__ int __smem[];
00053             return (T*)__smem;
00054         }
00055 
00056         __device__ __forceinline__ operator const T*() const
00057         {
00058             extern __shared__ int __smem[];
00059             return (T*)__smem;
00060         }
00061     };
00062 
00063     // specialize for double to avoid unaligned memory access compile errors
00064     template<> struct DynamicSharedMem<double>
00065     {
00066         __device__ __forceinline__ operator double*()
00067         {
00068             extern __shared__ double __smem_d[];
00069             return (double*)__smem_d;
00070         }
00071 
00072         __device__ __forceinline__ operator const double*() const
00073         {
00074             extern __shared__ double __smem_d[];
00075             return (double*)__smem_d;
00076         }
00077     };
00078 }}}
00079 
00080 #endif // __OPENCV_GPU_DYNAMIC_SMEM_HPP__
